About

Joseph Hyatt

🖖 My name is Joseph Hyatt and I'm a freelance software/web developer. I'm not an expert in any language but currently use Python, Ruby/Rails, JavaScript, Nodejs, Sass, and C++. The experience I built across such a variety of languages, frameworks, and platforms means that I’ve finally gotten over “fear of the unknown.” What actually matters is that I can figure things out with documentation, patience, and the invaluable knowledge base of knowing how to do a proper google search.

✊ I love making and sharing things I have built with the world.

📋 Currently I'm developing a Discussion Board Application. It's open source and a great way to communicate with a remote team.

🖊️ I love writing. You can read all the articles I write on Medium, or take a look through my personal wiki where I share everything I know.

🧠 I share my thoughts on Twitter, my code on GitHub, and my photos on Instagram.

📺 I also am starting to make educational YouTube videos, and share my music playlists.

🖥️ I am passionate about programming and discuss it all in my Discord Channel.

💾 Programming languages I use and feel comfortable with include Ruby/Rails, JavaScript, Nodejs, and C++.

💻 I'm always on the lookout for new career opportunities, feel free to view my Résumé.

🧔 If you want to know more about me, you can explore my wiki, or even contribute to it.

🤙 Nothing makes me happier than to help others. If you have questions about Computer Science, Web Development/Programming, or Math feel free to Email Me, WhatsApp Me, or join my Discord Channel.

☕ I love meeting new people. Currently, I reside in Southern California. Feel free to contact me if you would like to grab a coffee and talk.
